brief: Finds multiple rows that match the given expression
name: matchRows()
description: Finds the rows in the Table that match the regular expression provided, and returns references to those rows. Returns an iterator, so for must be used to iterate through all the rows, as shown in the example above. The column to search may be specified by either its ID or title.

parameters.name: column
parameters.description: ID number of the column to search

parameters.name: columnName
parameters.description: title of the column to search
